thread.title: Chef Works Dresses 5 of the Country's Top Young Chefs as They Square Off on FYI's "Man vs. Child"

title: Chef Works Dresses 5 of the Country's Top Young Chefs as They Square Off on FYI's "Man vs. Child"
text:
Chef Works Dresses 5 of the Country's Top Young Chefs as They Square Off on FYI's "Man vs. Child"
Poway, CA, October 17, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Chef Works, Inc., a global leader in the design and manufacturing of culinary, hospitality, and wait staff uniform apparel solutions, announced today that the company will serve as the official costume supplier which includes chef coats and aprons for season 1 of the FYI network’s popular cooking competition "Man vs. Child." The show airs Thursdays at 9pm ET on FYI beginning October 15th.
In each episode, competitors Cloyce (age 13), Holden (14), Emmalee (12), Dylan (11), and Estie (7) will don their Chef Works’ chef coats as they go head-to-head against executive-level chefs in three intense rounds. In the end, a panel of judges will determine whether the raw talent and imagination of these young culinary masters can top the training and experience of professional chefs, with only one walking away with ultimate bragging rights.
Commenting on its participation in the cooking series, Chef Works’ Marketing Director Amanda Stuckey stated, “At Chef Works, we not only focus on outfitting the professional culinary market but home cooks and aspiring chefs of all ages as well. Man vs. Child is the perfect marriage of those two worlds, highlighting the passion and creativity that exists among today’s youth and their ability to excel against older, more established chefs. We are thrilled to outfit these dynamic young cooks in some of our most popular chef coats and aprons and ensuring that they not only look the part but also stay safe and comfortable while competing.”
About Chef Works
Chef Works, Inc. is a worldwide culinary apparel manufacturing and distribution solution for the culinary, hotel, restaurant and food service industries. Offering cost-effective and efficient alternatives for companies of all sizes, Chef Works is the leader in uniform supply management, brand continuity, online ordering, on-site embroidery, personalized reporting, budget coordination and uniform design and distribution. Chef Works successfully manufactures and distributes culinary apparel in over 60 countries. They remain resolute in their mission to provide the best-quality products at the most competitive prices, focusing all of their efforts to ensure complete satisfaction and meet, or exceed, expectations for high-quality, well-designed, comfortable uniforms alongside superior customer service. For more information, visit ChefWorks.com.
